sml:System.gml:description: Vaisala WXT 520 Kombi-Meteosensor, K&Z CMP3 Pyranometer und Ecotech Kippwaage an Ecotech Envilog Maxi Datenlogger. Standort etwa 52.07982°N, 11.28261°E, WGS84 Dezimalgrad, aus Karte entnommen. UTM-Koordinaten (Transformiert): UTM 32, 656413 re, 5772375 ho. Akutelle Konfiguration ohne Kippwaage seit 27.05.2013 08:30 UTC.

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Relative humidity measured by a meteo sensor. Some devices (e.g. Neutron detectors) also measure relative humidity (e.g. in the logger box). Please enter those "operating parameters" under Technical Parameters\Devices. Default min/max values according to WMO quality control Guidelines.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Relative Humidity

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Please note in the sensor description what kind of air pressure is meant: 1. Absolute air pressure [abs] =locally measured 2. Relative air pressure [rel] = reduced to sea level. Default min/max values according to WMO quality control Guidelines.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Atmospheric Pressure

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Please note if the sensor is not protected from direct sunlight by a sensor housing. Some data loggers or various other devices (e.g. Neutron detectors) also measure air temperature. Default min/max values according to WMO quality control Guidelines.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Air Temperature

swe:Quantity.gml:description: "Operating parameter" of a data logger.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Temperature Data Logger

swe:Quantity.gml:description: "Operating parameter" of a data logger.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Voltage Logger

swe:Quantity.gml:description: consecutive number of all measurements of one day
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Value / Number

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Precipitation Height, Liquid=Rain Amount. Sensor e.g. accoustic rain sensor (e.g. at Vaisala WXT520).
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Precipitation Height, Liquid

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Precipitation Height, Total=Sum of Rain, Snow, Hail, etc. . Sensor e.g. tipping bucket or various rain gauges. Please note if the device is heated. Values are quasi real-time with heating. Without heating, values are not real time.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Precipitation Height, Total

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Short wave upward facing radiation, e.g. Pyranometer. Default min/max values according to WMO quality control Guidelines.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Global Radiation

swe:Quantity.gml:description: Wind direction 0…360°, where 0° is north. Please note a different reference direction in the sensor description. Default min/max values according to WMO quality control Guidelines.
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Wind Direction

swe:Quantity.gml:description: consecutive number of all measurements of one day
swe:Quantity.gml:name: Value / Number

swe:Quantity.gml:description: SENSOR-MIN
SENSOR-MAX
